originalText.text: Can't play Matthew Tomasone without watching an ad first.  Can't create a Matthew Tomasone station.   Can't choose lower quality data saving cellular streaming like other services such as Spotify.

originalText.text: I can not get anyone to respond to my email. I pay for a family plan, and they take the money out of my account faithfully. However, all my members keep getting kicked off. I have been trying to get information about this issue for over a year, and still no help or response.

originalText.text:
Great company that provides
Free music and allows you the
Option of paying or not but
Making it totally worth it when
And if you pay; cool business.

originalText.text: Pandora radio when it was free worked better for me but the ads were annoying.  So I subscribed basic and they said no ads.  Well they have ads and promo's and now they just play the same songs over and over. I try to use the thumb up and down as much as possible. The biggest scam is they now make it seem like everything is a premium service and you should probably upgrade.  WHAT A LETDOWN!!    So buyer beware.  Just another corporation trying to screw the little person trying to get along again..

originalText.text: Contacting Pandora for information is impossible. Look at their web site,. No links to customer service, no contact information. So when they make a charge to your credit card with no prior notice and send no invoice or receipt, you are up the proverbial creek.
